$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for Claude Code settings

apiKeyHelper.description: Path to a script that outputs authentication values

awsCredentialExport.description: Path to a script that exports AWS credentials

awsAuthRefresh.description: Path to a script that refreshes AWS authentication

cleanupPeriodDays.description: Number of days to retain chat transcripts (0 to disable cleanup)

env.description: Environment variables to set for Claude Code sessions

includeCoAuthoredBy.description: Whether to include Claude's co-authored by attribution in commits and PRs (defaults to true)

allow.description: List of permission rules for allowed operations

deny.description: List of permission rules for denied operations

ask.description: List of permission rules that should always prompt for confirmation

defaultMode.description: Default permission mode when Claude Code needs access

disableBypassPermissionsMode.description: Disable the ability to bypass permission prompts

additionalDirectories.description: Additional directories to include in the permission scope

model.description: Override the default model used by Claude Code

enableAllProjectMcpServers.description: Whether to automatically approve all MCP servers in the project

enabledMcpjsonServers.description: List of approved MCP servers from .mcp.json

disabledMcpjsonServers.description: List of rejected MCP servers from .mcp.json

matcher.description: String pattern to match (e.g. tool names like "Write")

timeout.description: Timeout in seconds for this specific command

hooks.description: List of hooks to execute when the matcher matches
Custom commands to run before/after tool executions

disableAllHooks.description: Disable all hooks and statusLine execution

enabledPlugins.description: Enabled plugins by repository. Keys are repository names, values are arrays of enabled plugin names

forceLoginMethod.description: Force a specific login method: "claudeai" for Claude Pro/Max, "console" for Console billing

otelHeadersHelper.description: Path to a script that outputs OpenTelemetry headers

outputStyle.description: Controls the output style for assistant responses

skipWebFetchPreflight.description: Skip the WebFetch blocklist check for enterprise environments with restrictive security policies

title: Claude Code Settings
description: Configuration settings for Claude Code. Learn more: https://docs.anthropic.com/en/docs/claude-code/settings
